WorkItem.Description:
The options to update items take a very long time to complete and the UI seizes up when they run.  How about making a modeless dialog to run the update process with some feedback on expected duration and a cancel button.  This is normally consider a necessary UI element fo tasks that take more than a few seconds and the updates can take 10s of minutes easily.
Â 
Plus if it were a modeless dialog, you could continue to use the application while the update runs in the background.  This would be much more user friendly than a very long arbitrary "hang" while it updates.

Comments.Message: We have a network status dialog coming. But using the app while doing sync's is going to be a long way out, if it ever happens.
